posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Dale
Very nice card, close up scans provided when you click on the image.  The current high offer was $1800 on this card was rejected by the people who owned 'shares' in it at Cardtarget.com.  If a higher offer is not received it will go to auction.

[url]http://www.cardtarget.com/cgi-bin/pm_details.cgi?productID=2024116912[/url]

email mike@cardtarget.com for more information and details
